Description.Name: Command Console
Description.Details: Final step, commander. By networking our recent batch of upgrades into the Argo's communication broadcast equipment, we should finally have the throughput to handle a full second lance. Only thing is, this will completely tie up our our communication abilities while commanding a mission, so I hope you won't be expecting any important calls.

AssignedCastDescription: At this point, I think only ComStar can claim to have better communication infrastructure in a single place.
